message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it!
I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair start
Meeting you halfway, Bob. Let's split it fairly!
I'm still holding out for a better deal, Alice. You can do better than that!
Getting closer to the middle, Bob. Let's meet at $5,500!
Getting closer to the middle, indeed! But I'm not quite there yet, Alice. You'll have to do better than that.
Getting closer to the middle, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I need something in return!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a middle ground, Alice. I'll take a bigger share this time.
I'm running out of patience, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
